title: My after game screen takes a long time to load.
body: It will take at 5 minutes at times and can be very frustrating. I know to get a better Toaster but this is the only feature in the client that is super slow. Any fixes?

replies.body:
You might have the option **"close client during game"** turned on. Check out the client options in the upper right-hand corner, and you should find that option at the top. 

Make sure it's **not checked** and test it out in a practice match to see how much quicker post game loads!

Hello again, 
Sorry to bother but this has created a new problem for me. 
For some reason having the client open is stopping other sounds from playing. I either listen to music or talk with friends while playing league. But for some reason I can only hear my friends and not league or league and not friends. The same thing happens when I solo with music (in-place of friends). The issue goes away if i close the client. Are you aware that this happens and know why it does?

If you're still having trouble, you could try going to "Playback Devices" -> your playback device -> properties -> advanced ->  untick "allow applications to take exclusive control of this device"
Hmmmm I haven't personally heard or encountered this kind of problem. I'd try messing with your volume options to make sure that the sounds aren't being disabled somehow.
